mat_sum_sq.hpp Headings
Source: mat_sum_sq # ifndef CPPAD_MAT_SUM_SQ_INCLUDED
# define CPPAD_MAT_SUM_SQ_INCLUDED
namespace CppAD { template <class Vector> void mat_sum_sq(size_t n, Vector& x , Vector& y , Vector& z) { size_t i, j, k; // Very simple computation of y = x * x for speed comparison for(i = 0; i < n; i++) { for(j = 0; j < n; j++) { y[i * n + j] = 0.; for(k = 0; k < n; k++) y[i * n + j] += x[i * n + k] * x[k * n + j]; } } z[0] = 0.; for(i = 0; i < n; i++) { for(j = 0; j < n; j++) z[0] += y[i * n + j]; } return; }
}
# endif
Input File: omh/mat_sum_sq_hpp.omh
